data.text: Naama ziɛgi zu Ezekiase zeeɓɛni, é ɠɛnina zaazu. Amɔse ná-doun zunui Ezayi, GALA goo wo nui liini pɔ bɛ, é ɠɛ ma: «Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa: ‹Ɗa-vaiti gaaɠula ba, é devei yɛ ɗa-ʋɛlɛyeɠei ya, tɔɔzei ɗa ga za, è la ɠulazu seeɓɛi nii zu.› »
Ezekiase ɠaaʋoteni pɛlɛi ma, é Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maanɛɛnɛni ɠani:
«Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, soma è ɠizɛ su ga sìɛʋɛ è ɠaazu ga wooɠɛɠiladai ta ɠi pagɔlai, gè naa ɠɛ nii pagai è ɠaazu.» Naa ʋoluma Ezekiase wɔlɔni, gaazuɗɛi ʋu ga gola.
Naazu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɓɔɛni Ezayi ʋɔ,
ga é li, é ɠɛ Ezekiase ma: «Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è-mɛmɛwola Davide ná-GALAGI wooi ɠaa: ‹Gè ɗa-maanɛɛnɛ wooi mɛniga, gè è-ɠaazuɗɛi ɠaa. Deɠɛmu gè kona puugɔ maazu lɔɔlugɔ (15) ʋiliga è-zii zu.
Ɗa-o, taai nii-yo, nà wo unmɔɔsu, gè wo ɠula Asiili masagi ya, nà taai nii makɛ.›
Wɛlɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-poogi ʋa è ʋɛ, é dɛɛ ga wooi nii é bogai, toɠa daazeeli:
‹Nu lɛɛzuʋɛ Aɠaze ná-kɔɠɔ losuʋɛ wu, foloi zeɠeni niina ná, niinigi ʋɛɛ naa ma.› » Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI niinigi ɠulani ʋolu ga kɔɠɔ losu puugɔ, é zeɠe nu ɠɔɠɔ losuʋɛti, foloi ɗa loo naa ma ʋolu.
Zuda masagi Ezekiase ɠɛdɛgai ma, é ɠula ná-seeɓɛi zu, é ɠima ɓɔɛi nii zɛʋɛni.
«Gè ɠɛni ɠɛɛzu ma:
Gè ɠɛni ɠɛɛzu ma:
Zɛ̀nvui ɠulaa zèa, é li maaɠooza bà,
Gè ɓɔɠɔ zoni eyɛsu sobui.
Gè ɠɛni kpee goiti toozu eɠɛ sɛʋɛzɛʋɛgoi,
Leeni ɠa nà bo?
Maliɠii, è-laawooi zaɓui zu ɠa nu ɠa yɛnvu la è ɠoozunɛ,
Nà-kidaaʋili golai valiboga ga ziilɛigi,
Gɔvɛalaazu laade a è maamusɛ,
Fulu nuiti nɔ ɠa ta zoo è maamusɛzu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI kìzoni!
Ezayi devei woni ga: «Ti ʋa ga kooleɠoolegi ɠaawaai ɠaayɔgai, ti siɛ wologi ɠa, masagi ɠa ʋalo.»
Ezekiase ɠɛni ma: «Poogi ɓɛgele ɠa nà kwɛɛ da ga nà zoo gè li Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zei ʋɛlɛi ma ɠoizuʋɛ?»
